Hello, friends.  I would like to sell the following McGinnity/McCarty T201. It has been graded a 30 by the fine folks at SGC.  I am asking SOLD, which includes shipping.  PP payment owed/gift please.  Thank you very much for looking!


Best,

Andy

Thanks to Ricky for helping me out!
Bump for price drop.  Feel free to make an offer.
